full_summary:
**About This Tender Announcement**
=============================================

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is pleased to announce a Request for Proposal (RFP) for [Snow Removal Services](#hn92t92175)

**Key Details**
---------------

| **Field** | **Value** |
| ----------
| **Reference Number** | WS4083733200-Doc4083926089 |
| **Notice Type** | Request for Proposal - Competitive - Open bidding |
| **Procurement Category** | SRV - Services |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | November 15, 2023 |
| **Trade Agreements** | Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and many others [...](see details below)
| **Regions of Delivery** | Kingston, Ontario |
| **Contact Information** | [Guo Liao, PSPC](mailto:guo.liao@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) |

**Request Details**
-----------------

The PSPC invites interested bidders to submit a proposal for [Snow Removal Services](#hn92t92175) in Kingston, Ontario. The tender features a Notice Type of Request for Proposal, Competitive - Open bidding, and a Procurement Category of SRV - Services. 

The expected contract start date is November 15, 2023, but a specific end date has not been determined.

**Trade Agreements**
-----------------

This tender process adheres to various trade agreements.

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Contact and Bid Submissions**
------------------------------

Liason: Guo Liao, PSPC
Email: guo.liao@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Bids must be submitted on August 16, 2023, by 14:00 EDT. To submit a bid,
